name: Yojambo 2
description:
Inspired by Yojimbo, Cowboy Bebop, Thief, Deus Ex, Pathologic 2

Disclosure: tech work and some design before the start of jam

  • frustum culling
  • level editor
  • physics
  • pathfinding
  • dialogue
  • player actions

CONTROLS

  • Press escape to view the controls while playing
  • WASD to move
  • Control to crouch
  • Right click to throw/shoot
  • 1-4 to equip

Credits:

3d models: by G William Boyd

Programming/design: Collin Eye
